name: Scaletextjs
body:
Scale Text JS =========== Scale Text JS is a simple to use plugin for jQuery that allows you to scale text to the width AND height of the container component. Its really easy to set up. make sure to have the correct markup
ScaleText JS
then simply scale the text with the following selector $(".mydiv").scaletext(); Demo ===== [To the see the demo in action click here](http://blissitec.com/demos/scaletext/examples/1.html)
